Subjects: Christ, love to sinners; sermons, verse in
_description: Christ’s love for his ‘drury’ — six lines in couplets

TCD277.Transcription:
Allon he drawys fro cumpany& sor he syghys on hys drirylufly
                    he spekes to hys hertfor he has sufferyd paynys smertthurgh tokynys
                    gret of gyfyngvn to hys swete in hert luf murnyng
TCD277.Note:
Added to top margin of page of a Latin sermon for Good Friday,
                        ‘Sermo de passione Cristi in die parascenes facienda’ (p.
                    185).
